name: MegaGargomon
effect: [When Digivolving] For each green Tamer you have in play, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. They don't unsuspend during your opponent's next unsuspend phase.[When Attacking][Once Per Turn] Return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon with DP less than or equal to this Digimon's DP to its owner's hand.
